title: Behara Subhakar Polytechnic College, Visakhapatnam: Courses, Fees, Admission, Placement, Scholarship
meta_description: Behara Polytechnic College, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, Polytechnic . 6 Courses. Average Fees is 49867 per year.

faqs.question: Ques. Does Behara Subhakar Polytechnic College provide scholarships to students who don't appear for POLYCET?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, the students who don't appear for POLYCET aren't eligible for scholarships.

faqs.question: Ques. Is it compulsory to counsel the entrance exam at Behara Subhakar Polytechnic College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, Engineering aspirants seeking admission in the respective diploma courses are required to possess a legitimate score of POLYCET.

faqs.question: Ques. Which of the students get selected during on-campus recruitment at Behara Subhakar Polytechnic College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Most of the students from Mechanical Engineering (DME) and Computer Science Engineering (DCSE) get placed during on-campus recruitment.

faqs.question: Ques. What is eligibility to apply for POLYCET?
faqs.answer: Ans.Eligibility to apply POLYCET AP is:Students must have passed SSC exam/class 10 conducted by the State Board of Secondary Education, Andhra Pradesh/ Telangana.Those belonging to NIOS/CBSE/ICSE/ or equivalent exam recognized by A.P. government can also apply.Candidates must pass all subjects including Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry with minimum 35% marks in each subject.Students appearing are also eligible to apply.

BPC Visakhapatnam Courses.Eligibility Criteria: The aspirant seeking admission in Diploma in Engineering must have cleared class X/SSC with a minimum of 35% mark or equivalent from a recognized board, alongside Physics, Chemistry, Maths as a major subject.
